alert.note: Alert for Pecos (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 10 at 7:17PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pecos County through 800 PM CDT... At 716 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Fort Stockton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... I-10 east of Fort Stockton. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 262 and 285. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
